（……私の機体は補給も修理も終わってる。\nこれなら、いつでも出撃できるはず）:
(...My aircraft has finished resupplying and repairing.
With this, I should be able to sortie at any time.)
（私は月ヶ瀬さんを……シリウスシュガーを裏切った。\nせめてもの償いをしなければ:
(I betrayed Tsukigase-san... Sirius Sugaru.
If I don't at least make amends, I won't be able to forgive myself...!)
やっぱりこっそり行くつもりだったのね。: So you were planning to sneak off after all.
ジュ、ジュリー！？ どうしてここに……？: J-Julie?! What are you doing here?
私達もいるよ。心香ちゃんって、\nすぐ顔に出るからバレバレなんだよねー。:
We're here too. Kokoroka-chan is...
It's obvious because it's written all over your face.
まったく……ひとりで出撃だなんて、寂しすぎるじゃない。: Honestly... It's way too lonely to be deployed alone.
なんでって、そりゃチームメイトだからでしょ。: Why? Because we’re teammates, of course.
いつでも一緒なのがチームでしょ？: The team is always together, isn't it?
で、でも、これは私個人の償いだから……\nみんなには関係のない……:
B-But this is my personal atonement...
It has nothing to do with everyone...
はぁ……心香って本当にバカね！\nあたし達を仲間に入れてくれないなんて、それこそ:
*sigh*... You really are an idiot, Kokoru!
If you won't let us join you, that's a betrayal!
チームだったら、プラスもマイナスも\n全部一緒に背負うものでしょう？:
If we were a team, we wouldn't have any positives or negatives.
It's all something we carry with us, isn't it?
あたし達の欲しい言葉は『みんなには関係ない』じゃない。\nわかるわよね？:
What we want isn't “nothing to do with everyone”.
You understand, don't you?
一緒に背負わせて、心香ちゃんの気持ちを。\n……ううん、一緒に背負いたいの。大好:
Let's carry her on our shoulders together, and tell her how Koko-chan feels.
...No, I want to carry it with me. We're friends I love.
わ、私、月ヶ瀬さんの……シリウスシュガーの役に立ちたい。\nそのために……みんな:
I-I want to be useful to Tsukigase-san... to Sirius Sugaru.
To that end... I want you to lend me your strength.
――特別養成校舎、プレ・クラス－Ａ！ 全機出撃！\n敬愛する我らが師、シリウスシ:
――Special training building, Pre-Class-A! All units, move out!
We're going to support our beloved teacher, Sirius Sugaru!
――夜明け直後、俺達シリウスシュガーは柊校舎を出発した。: —Right after dawn, we Sirius Sugaru depart from the Hiiragi building.
ね、眠い……いつもだったらまだ寝てる時間だから……: I-I'm sleepy... Normally, I'd still be asleep...
低空飛行と隠密機動を駆使し、\nなるべく気づかれないように敵に接近……ですか。:
Using low-altitude flight and covert maneuvers,
Getting as close to the enemy as possible without being noticed, huh?
まあ、正々堂々と戦っても勝てる相手ではありませんが……\nなんか、こう……:
Well, even if we fight fair and square, we can't win...
For some reason, like this...
相手はカオスメイデン級。対策の暇もなかったし、正面衝突は避けたい。\nだから、ま:
Our opponent was Chaos Maiden-class. We didn’t have time to prepare a countermeasure, so I wanted to avoid a head-on collision.
That’s why it’s pointless if we don’t launch a surprise attack first and destroy a corner of the opponent.
いいか？ 作戦の再確認だ。最初の狙いはピクシス・マスール。\nあのチームで警戒す:
Okay? Let's double-check the operation. Our first target is Pixis Masulu.
The one we should be wary of on that team is our leader, Dorothea.
だからこそ、まずドロテアを集中攻撃して撃墜する。: That’s why they’d focus their attacks on Dorothea first and shoot her down
いくらユーロ・タワーの最強格といっても、\n複数を相手にすればボロが出るはず。:
No matter how strong the Euro Tower was,
If you take on multiple opponents, you should be able to beat them to a pulp.
一気に畳みかけて主力を削り、戦いの主導権を握るんだ。いいな？: Fold them all at once, whittle down the main force, and take the initiative in the battle. Got it?
おっけーおっけー。隠れ続けるよりこっちの方が性に合ってるわ。: Okay, okay. I'm better suited to this than to keep hiding.
そろそろ交戦か……お前達、気合を入れていけよ！: It's almost time to engage... You guys, get fired up!
